SELECT a.activity_name, SUM(ap.activity_amount) activity_amount FROM activity_payment ap INNER JOIN activity a ON a.activity_no = ap.activity_no WHERE ap.host_no = #{hostNo} AND
DATEDIFF(NOW(),ap.update_date) <= 90
GROUP BY a.activity_name ORDER BY activity_amount DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT ab.accom_building_name, SUM(ap.accom_amount) accom_amount FROM accom_payment ap INNER JOIN accom_room ar ON ar.accom_room_no = ap.accom_room_no INNER JOIN accom_building ab ON ab.accom_building_no = ar.accom_building_no WHERE ap.host_no = #{hostNo} AND
DATEDIFF(NOW(),ap.update_date) <= 90
GROUP BY ab.accom_building_name ORDER BY accom_amount DESC LIMIT 0,1

mapper.update: UPDATE accom_payment SET accom_payment_state = '결제취소', update_date = NOW() WHERE accom_payment_no = #{accomPaymentNo}
mapper.select: SELECT accom_payment_no accomPaymentNo, accom_room_no accomRoomNo, member_id memberId, accom_checkin accomCheckIn, accom_checkout accomCheckOut, accom_amount accomAmount, accom_use_person accomUsePerson, accom_payment_state accomPaymentState, receipt receipt, create_date createDate FROM accom_payment WHERE accom_payment_no = #{accomPaymentNo}

SELECT ap.accom_payment_no, ap.member_id, ap.accom_checkin, ap.accom_checkout, ap.accom_amount, ap.accom_use_person, ap.accom_payment_state, ap.receipt, ap.create_date, ar.accom_room_name, ab.accom_building_name, ai.accom_room_image_name, ai.accom_room_image_ext FROM accom_payment ap INNER JOIN accom_room ar ON ap.accom_room_no = ar.accom_room_no INNER JOIN accom_building ab ON ar.accom_building_no = ab.accom_building_no INNER JOIN accom_room_image ai ON ap.accom_room_no = ai.accom_room_no WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND ai.accom_room_image_name = (SELECT accom_room_image_name FROM accom_room_image WHERE accom_room_no = ap.accom_room_no ORDER BY accom_room_no ASC LIMIT 0,1) AND ai.accom_room_image_ext = (SELECT accom_room_image_ext FROM accom_room_image WHERE accom_room_no = ap.accom_room_no ORDER BY accom_room_no ASC LIMIT 0,1) ORDER BY ap.create_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM accom_payment WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
